name: Home Steal Rhythm Home (Demo)
description:
Home Steal Rhythm Home

What makes a house into something you can call home? Mapancho thinks the things he is missing are what his house is missing. Help him find a way to make his house feel like a home again.

This is game was made for the Global game jam 2019

Controls:

Left and Right arrow keys: Move the character.

Up arrow key: Jump, talk and move to the next text.

ESCape: Close the game.

R: Restart the game.

F4: Switch fullscreen.

Inside a house you can jump, after jumping you can make a second jump or move in one direction one time, after that you are just going to fall.
